member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:EVARest.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: The challenge resource.

member.summary: This fancy method returns the challenge for today.

member.name: M:EVARest.Controllers.ChallengeController.GetChallenges
member.summary: Gets all the challenges the user has done. It can be that the user skipped days.

member.name: M:EVARest.Controllers.ChallengeController.GetChallenge(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all the information about a challenge that a user has.
member.returns: The requested challenge, with all the information

member.name: M:EVARest.Controllers.ChallengeController.InsertChallenge(EVARest.ViewModels.ChallengeViewModel)
member.summary:
Creates a challenge for the user, according to user preferences.
A user can only request one challenge a day.
Supported: (tag.)Recipe, CreativeCooking, Restaurant, other tag is converted to text challenge
member.remarks: A user can only request one challenge a day.
member.exception: When this function gets called more than once a day.
member.returns: 200: Challenge was succesfully added returns the created challenge. 400: An exception has accord. (Message)

member.name: M:EVARest.Controllers.ChallengeController.MarkChallengeAsDone(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the challenge generated today to be done. The earnings are added to the user points and batches are rewarded. The challenge must be created today.
member.param: The challenge that has been done.

member.summary: Delete all the challenges that the users has.

member.name: M:EVARest.Controllers.ChallengeController.DeleteChallenge(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a challenge that the user has.
